application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Replacement of single-glazed, timber windows to double-glazed, timber windows in matching casement and sash window styles.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings: Existing Front Elevation Living Room Casement Window Interior View; Proposed Front Elevation Living Room Casement Window Interior View; Existing Front Elevation Bedroom Casement Window Interior View; Proposed Front Elevation Bedroom Casement Window Interior View; Existing Front Elevation Bedroom Box Sash Window Interior View; Proposed Front Elevation Bedroom Box Sash Window Interior View; Existing Front Elevation Living Room Casement Window Sections; Proposed Front Elevation Living Room Casement Window Sections; Existing Front Elevation Bedroom Casement Window Sections; Proposed Front Elevation Bedroom Casement Window Sections; Existing Front Elevation Bedroom Box Sash Window Sections; Proposed Front Elevation Bedroom Box Sash Window Sections: Existing Front Elevation: Proposed Front Elevation
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B, 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 1.1, 1.2, 2.1 and 2.10, and policies GG1, D3, D4, D5, and HC1 of the London Plan (2021)
